mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cbr(cbr_no, c_code, id, cbr_regdate, cbr_content, cb_no) values (seq_cbrno.nextval, #{c_code}, #{id}, sysdate, #{cbr_content},#{cb_no})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,tbl_cbr.* from tbl_cbr where cb_no=#{cb_no} order by cbr_no) where rn between (#{cri.pageStart}+1) and (#{cri.pageStart}+#{cri.perPageNum})
select count(*) from tbl_cbr where cb_no=#{cb_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cbr where id = #{id} and c_code = #{c_code}
